hackathon-judges.judge-name: Thank you to our Sponsoring Judges for volunteering your time

hackathon-eligibility: Participants: Must be College of Computing students (CS, CM, MS in CS/CSE, Analytics). Individuals (over 18 years in age); Teams (up to 4 students)
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Klaus Advanced Computing Building, 266 Ferst Dr, Atlanta, GA 30313, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Theme (25%)
How well the application is build around making a difference?

Technical Difficulty (25%)
Complexity of the application

Design/Polish (25%)
The overall quality of the final product

Innovation (25%):
The originality of the concept.

hackathon-location-address: Klaus Advanced Computing Building, 266 Ferst Dr, Atlanta, GA 30313, USA
hackathon-description-header: Participants will have the chance to produce big or small solutions for individual or global needs. We want you to use technology power to spark positive change in our communities.
